title: Probability Distribution: Everybody Needs a Hero Part II
question_text: At Burger Bell when someone buys a Hero Meal they receive an action figure.  The distribution of action figures is shown in the table below. Action Figure A B C D P(x) 0.30 0.10 0.10 0.50 Assuming each Hero Meal is independent of one another, what is the probability when someone buys two Hero Meals they get action figures A and B ?
